title: collection
description: metadata for a data collection belonging to a Patch-seq project. Source: project-registration-biccn

title.description: Long form title of the collection

shortTitle.description: Short form title of the collection. Should be <30 characters.

description.description: Description of the collection. Specify license application here.

dataArchive.description: Archive at which data will be deposited.

species.description: Common english name of species of the donor from which data were collected. See species Controlled Vocabulary.

accessControl.description: Level of acess specified for data in collection. See accessControl Controlled Vocabulary.

completionState.description: Whether or not additional data is being generated for this collection. See completionState Controlled Vocabulary.

modality.description: Defines modality of the data in this collection. See modality Controlled Vocabulary.

technique.description: Technique used to acquire data in this collection. See technique Controlled Vocabulary.

webResource.description: Links to relevant tools/pages to data collection.
